snippet: But allegations of murder and torture were fabricated, according to an official inquiry into what happened to those captured in a battle in Iraq in 2004.
abstract: Official British investigation concludes that nine Iraqis captured by British soldiers after 2004 battle during Iraq war were mistreated at times, but that allegations of murder and torture are false; report clears British forces of worst charges against them.
lead_paragraph: But allegations of murder and torture were fabricated, according to an official inquiry into what happened to those captured in a battle in Iraq in 2004.

headline.main: Nine Iraqis Were Mistreated in British Custody, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Nine Iraqis Were Mistreated in British Custody, Report Says
